description.zh: MCP Travel Planner Agent Team 是一个基于 Streamlit 构建的AI旅行规划应用，利用多个模型上下文协议（MCP）服务器生成高度详细且个性化的旅行行程。它通过专用的 MCP 服务器集成 Airbnb 和 Google Maps 的实时数据，提供准确的住宿信息、距离计算和位置服务。该应用还整合了天气预报、餐厅与景点详情以及预算分析，帮助用户轻松制定全面的旅行计划。
description.en: The MCP Travel Planner Agent Team is an AI-powered travel planning application built with Streamlit that generates highly detailed, personalized itineraries by leveraging multiple Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers. It integrates real-time data from Airbnb and Google Maps via dedicated MCP servers to provide accurate accommodation options, distance calculations, and location-based services. The app also incorporates weather forecasts, restaurant and attraction details, and budget analysis, enabling users to plan comprehensive trips with ease.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 利用AI和实时数据提供高度个性化的旅行行程
- 借助实时住宿和交通数据提升行程规划准确性
- 自动化复杂的旅行安排和调度，节省用户时间

## 功能列表:

- 详细的每日行程，包含时间、地址和费用
- 通过Airbnb MCP实现实时住宿价格和可用性集成
- 使用Google Maps MCP进行精确的距离和交通时间计算
- 提供逐向导引的交通路线优化
- 对所有推荐地点进行地址验证
- 天气预报及穿衣建议
- 餐厅和景点研究，包括价格、评论和开放时间
- 当地文化信息和实用旅行提示（如货币、安全）
- 详细的费用分项和符合预算的推荐
- 支持导出为日历文件（.ics格式），兼容主流日历平台
- 安排缓冲时间以应对延误和交通
- 提供多个靠近市中心的住宿选择
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Delivers hyper-personalized travel itineraries using AI and real-time data
- Enhances planning accuracy with live accommodation and transportation data
- Saves time by automating complex trip logistics and scheduling

## Features:

- Extremely detailed day-by-day itineraries with timing, addresses, and costs
- Real-time integration with Airbnb MCP for current pricing and availability
- Precise distance and travel time calculations using Google Maps MCP
- Transportation optimization with turn-by-turn guidance
- Address verification for all recommended locations
- Weather forecasts with clothing recommendations
- Restaurant and attraction research including prices, reviews, and opening hours
- Local insights and practical travel tips (e.g., currency, safety)
- Comprehensive cost breakdown and budget-conscious recommendations
- Calendar export functionality (.ics file) for major calendar platforms
- Buffer time planning for delays and transit
- Multiple accommodation options with proximity to city center
